mapper.select: SELECT RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT.*, company_and_product_temp.*, receiving_company_list.*, product_temp.*, inventory.* FROM RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT JOIN company_and_product_temp ON RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT.COMPANY_AND_PRODUCT_TEMP_SEQ = company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_AND_PRODUCT_TEMP_SEQ JOIN receiving_company_list ON company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_SEQ = receiving_company_list.COMPANY_SEQ JOIN product_temp ON company_and_product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ = product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ JOIN inventory ON product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ = inventory.PRODUCT_SEQ

SELECT company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_SEQ, company_and_product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ, product_temp.PRODUCT_CODE, product_temp.PRODUCT_NAME, product_temp.PRODUCT_PRICE, receiving_company_list.COMPANY_NAME, inventory.PRODUCT_AMOUNT FROM company_and_product_temp JOIN product_temp ON company_and_product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ = product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ JOIN receiving_company_list ON receiving_company_list.COMPANY_SEQ = company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN inventory ON inventory.PRODUCT_SEQ = product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ
SELECT COMPANY_EMPLOYEE, ADDRESS FROM RECEIVING_COMPANY_LIST WHERE COMPANY_NAME = #{COMPANY_NAME}
